ISSUE.TITLE: CI Flake: podman system prune networks: expected string length 1

Failure [2.724 seconds] Podman prune prune networks [It] BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #15988 from sstosh/manifest-annotate-remote remote: fix manifest add --annotation

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix "podman system prune networks" flake Since by default the network config dir is shared in the e2e tests any other parallel running test could remove a network and cause this test to fail. Fixes #15990 Signed-off-by: Paul Holzinger <pholzing@redhat.com>
